i really hate the cooldown ban. sometimes they simply do it without any reason. i was recently banned for failure to reconnect to the match. i have been trying to reconnect but the server themselves unable to find the matchmaking for me.
personally i think they just want to put blame on players for leaving the game when in fact their server is problematic for not allowing me to reconnect. i really hope they can lift my ban asap.
